email_body: Panama Canal Cruise Ship: Sun Princess 1-900-225-5744 or 1-800-princess Leave: November 29, 2000 Delta Airlines DFW to Atlanta Flt 16, depart 07:35am, arrive 10:39am Atlanta to San Jose: Flt. 464, depart 12:00 noon, arrive 04:36pm Return: December 9, 2000 Continental Airlines San Jose to Houston Flt. 723, depart 8:02pm, arrive 09:08pm I'll talk with you Tuesday evening before I leave.?
